settings.heading: RAM® X-Grip®
settings.copy: The spring-loaded RAM® X-Grip® cradle expands and contracts to provide a perfect fit for your device. Made of high-strength composite and stainless steel, this popular phone* and tablet holder is compatible with a wide variety of RAM® mounting bases. Available for phones of all sizes and tablets ranging from 7” to 12” in size, the RAM® X-Grip® cradle secures your device while keeping it completely functional and accessible. No matter what mounting base you pair the RAM® X-Grip® with, the RAM® ball and socket technology allows for near-infinite adjustability.

settings.heading: Features
settings.copy: Constructed using high-strength composites and stainless steel, the RAM® X-Grip® also features rubber-coated grips to firmly secure devices. This versatile device mount is compatible with a wide variety of RAM® arms and mounting bases so you can take your favorite device nearly anywhere.

settings.heading: RAM® Tough-Charge™ with X-Grip® Technology
settings.copy: The RAM® Tough-Charge™ with X-Grip® Technology is the world's first patented, universal waterproof wireless charging cradle for phones. Designed with spring-loaded RAM® X-Grip® Technology, this cradle features the well known 'X' design that expands and contracts to secure nearly any phone while taking advantage of Qi compatible wireless phone charging up to 10W. An optional support leg allows you to adjust your phone to the ideal position, aligning the wireless charging coils.

settings.heading: Phone Mounts
settings.copy: Fitting phones of all sizes, the RAM® X-Grip® keeps your device functional while in the cradle. Thanks to the RAM® ball and socket system, this phone mount allows for near-infinite adjustability so you can achieve the perfect viewing angle. With a turn of a knob, quickly relocate your RAM® X-Grip® to a different mounting application.

settings.heading: Tablet Mounts
settings.copy: The RAM® X-Grip® for tablets adds four more rubber-coated grips to the design, keeping devices from 7” to 12” in size secure and accessible. The RAM® ball and socket system allows for near-infinite adjustability and also dampens shock and vibration, helping to reduce vibration in the most extreme environments.

settings.heading: Accessories
settings.copy: For outdoor applications where excessive wind and G-force could cause movement of your device, the RAM® X-Grip® tether is recommended. Made of high-strength elastomeric material, this safety tether adds security and peace of mind for phones and tablets up to 8”. Replacement rubber-coated grips are also available.
*The RAM® X-Grip® for phones and small tablets includes a safety tether for added security and peace of mind.
